author: Simon Difford
description: Created by Philip Bischoff, bar manager at Singapore’s Four Seasons multi-award winning Hotel Bar, Manhattan. Philip created this drink for Patrón Tequila as part of their activity for London Cocktail Week 2016.
name: Patrón Señor Sling

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with soda and lightly stir

video.name: HOWTO make Patrón Señor Sling
